title: People keep insisting that I don't care about Trump's tax returns
body:
But nobody ever explains why in much detail

Can someone explain this? Why am I not allowed to care about his tax returns? Why does this bother people? Why does asking about it twist people up inside. 

He said he would show them.
He said it is important that they be shown.
He demanded that others show theirs. 

Privacy is not an issue any longer, does he have some wonderful excuse I missed not to show them? I mean if he's gonna lie about that he should at least talk in more detail about why he's choosing not to.
